column1: NGR is from 1950s record and is Nant-y-Barcut. Altitudes match
Combined reading for Feb to May 1942 - 28.9 and for Nov/Dec = 13.5

4 consecutive readings, May to Aug 1942, are duplicates of a station LAKE-VYRNWY-GADFA, which is 4.8km away with no obvious connections between observers. Neither record admits copying and there are 4 other more random duplications. Some readings have been left in this record
